content: stitch count 16sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 21 roun d 9 note join a few stitches away from your corner for a neater finish remember to watch your gauge or go up half a hook size join ar ound the post of any st of round 7 surface slip_stitch across each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 17 surface sl sts per side round 1 0 note if you increased hook size for last round remember to go back to original hook size join in any corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *1sc in each of the next 18sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 18sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 22 roun d 1 1 join in any corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc ch2 2dc in the same space *skip the hidden st and the next st 3dc in the next st sk2sts 3dc in the next st 5 times sk2sts 2dc ch2 2dc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 6 3dc shells per side 2dc ch2 2dc in each corner 23 roun d 1 2 note the entire round is worked blo slip_stitch into the corner space ch3 this counts as the 1st treble_crochet 1trc ch2 2trc in the same space *work ing blo make 1dc in each of the next 2sts ch2 dc3tog over the next 3sts 6 times ch2 1dc in each of the last 2sts 2trc ch2 2trc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch3 with a slip_stitch do no t end off stitch count 4dc 6dc3tog 7 ch2-spaces per side 2trc ch2 2trc in each corner 24 roun d 1 3 slip_stitch into the corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1sc in each of the next 3sts 2sc in the ch2-space 1sc in the dc3tog 6 times 2sc in the ch2-space 1sc in each of the next 4sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 27sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner roun d 1 4 join in any corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch2 2hdc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1hdc in each of the next 28sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the corner
